official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, pertaining to acquisition of rights-of-way before completion of environmental impact statements.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation, in exceptional cases, to make funds available to a State for the acquisition of rights-of-way on a Federal-aid highway system before completion of an environmental impact statement. Directs the Secretary to notify the appropriate Congressional committees of a State's request for such funds.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, pertaining to acquisition of rights-of-way before completion of environmental impact statements.
